Get a list of collaboration partners for this organization.

Parameters:
context - The Matrix Context.
objectSelects - optional list of selectables - may contain any Organization selectable.
relationshipSelects - optional list of selectables
objectWhere - optional where clause - may contain any Organization selectable.

Throws:
FrameworkException - if operation fails

getAllVaultsDetails

public static MapList getAllVaultsDetails(Context context,
                                          java.lang.String orgId,
                                          boolean includeCollaborationPartners)
                                   throws FrameworkException
get All vaults Details of the Organization as a MapList. With Selectables are SELECT_NAME gives name of the vault SELECT_DESCRIPTION gives description of the vault

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
includeCollaborationPartners - the boolean to include or exclude collaborationPartner vaults
Throws:
FrameworkException - if operation fails
Since:
Common 10.5.0.1
